name: How much do you know about Two Hit Wonders? | Quiz

questions.text: Neneh Cherry had the number 3 song with 'Buffalo Stance' but which song did she take to number 8 in the U.S.?
questions.explanation:
Kisses in the Wind.

	Save Tonight was done by Neneh's brother, Eagle Eye Cherry.

questions.text: The Climax Blues band took 'Couldn't Get It Right' to number 3, but which followup went to number 12?
questions.explanation:
I Love You.

	The other 3 songs were all done by Kymaxx.

questions.text: Club Nouveau took 'Lean on Me' all the way to the top of the chart, but could only get to number 39 with which song?
questions.correct: Why You Treat Me So Bad
questions.explanation:
Why You Treat Me So Bad.

	The other 3 songs all had vocals by Bill Withers who did the original version of 'Lean on Me'.

questions.text: The Spencer Davis Group took 'Gimme Some Lovin' to number 7, but which song did they take to number 10?
questions.explanation:
I'm a Man.

	The other 3 songs were done by Steve Winwood who was a member of The Spencer Davis Group.

questions.text: Robbie Dupree took 'Steal Away' to number 6, but only could get to number 15 with which song?
questions.explanation:
Hot Rod Hearts.

	Robbie Dupree had a little help from Christine Mcvie on backup for his songs.

questions.text: EMF took 'Unbelievable' to number 1, but their follow-up only hit number 18, what song?
questions.explanation:
Lies.

	The other 3 songs were done by the Thompson Twins who also recorded a song called 'Lies'.

questions.text: Extreme took 'More Than Words' to number 1, and got as high as number 4 with which of their follow-up songs?
options: All I want to do is Make Love to You
questions.explanation:
Hole Hearted.

	The other songs were all done by Heart.

questions.text: Falco took 'Rock Me Amadeus' to number 1, but only could get to number 8 with what song?
questions.explanation:
Vienna Calling.

	A lot of people think Falco also had the US hit 'Der Kommisar' but in the US it was a hit for a group called After the Fire.

questions.text: Foxy took 'Get off' to number 9, but only got to number 21 with which song?
questions.explanation: Hot Number.

questions.text: Gloria Gaynor took her second hit 'I will Survive' to number 1, but her first hit only got as high as number 9, what was her first hit?
questions.explanation:
Never Can Say Goodbye.

	The other 3 songs were all done by Donna Summer.

questions.text: Golden Earring took 'Radar Love' to number 13, but went 3 spot higher to number 10 with their follow-up. What song was their follow-up?
questions.explanation: Twilight Zone.

questions.text: Eddy Grant took 'Electric Avenue' to number 2, but followed up that song with which song that hit number 26.
options: Get into my Car, Get out of my Dreams
questions.explanation:
Romancin' the Stone.

	The other 3 songs were all done by Billy Ocean.

questions.text: Great White took 'Once Bitten, Twice Shy' to Number 5, but which song of theirs went only to number 30?
questions.explanation:
The Angel Song.

	The other 3 songs were all done by Aerosmith.

questions.text: Henry Gross took 'Shannon' to number 6, but his follow-up only went to number 37, what song was it?
questions.explanation:
Springtime Mama.

	The other 3 songs were all hits for Genesis.

questions.text: Albert Hammond took 'It Never Rains in Southern California' to number 5, but with which song did he get only to number 31 with?
questions.explanation:
I'm a Train.

	The other 3 songs were all done by Kansas.

questions.text: Dan Hill took 'Sometimes When We Touch' to Number 3, and followed that up with a number 6 with which song?
questions.explanation:
Can't We Try.

	He dueted with Vonda Shepard on Can't We Try. Vonda is probably better known as the singer who appears on 'Ally McBeal'.

questions.text: The Hues Corporation hit number 1 with 'Rock the Boat', but what song did they take to number 18?
questions.explanation:
Rockin' Soul.

	The other 3 were songs by Shaun Cassidy.

questions.text: Julio Iglesias took 'To All the Girls I've Loved Before' to number 5 with the help of Willie Nelson, but only could get to number 19 with his follow-up, what song was it?
questions.explanation:
All of You.

	The other 3 songs were done by Linda Ronstadt.

questions.text: The Irish Rovers took 'The Unicorn' to number 7, then dropped the Irish from their name at went to number 37 with what song as The Rovers?
questions.explanation:
Wasn't That A Party.

	The other 3 songs were all done by U2.

questions.text: Johnny Hates Jazz went to number 2 with 'Shattered Dreams' but hit number 31 with which follow-up song?
questions.correct: I Don't Want to Be a Hero
options: Too Much, Too Little, Too Late
questions.explanation:
I Don't Want to Be a Hero.

	The other 3 songs were done by Johnny Mathis.

questions.text: Don Johnson took 'Heartbeat' to number 5, but when teamed up with Barbra Streisand could only get to number 25, which song did he duet with Streisand?
questions.explanation: Till I Loved You.

questions.text: Looking Glass took 'Brandy (You're a Fine Girl)' to number 1, but only got as high as 33 with which song?
questions.explanation:
Jimmy Loves Mary-Anne.

	The other 3 songs were by Bob Seger.

questions.text: Chuck Mangione hit number 4 with the instrumental 'Feels So Good' , but only number 18 with his second hit, what song?
questions.explanation: Give It All You Got.

questions.text: Men Without Hats took 'The Safety Dance' to number 1, but their follow-up went only to number 20, what song?
options: I'd Like to Teach the World to Sing
questions.explanation: Pop Goes the World.

questions.text: Alannah Myles took 'Black Velvet' to number 1, but her follow-up stopped at number 36, what song?
questions.explanation:
Love Is.

	The other 3 songs were all done by Elvis, the subject of Black Velvet.
